snippet.title: Tomb Raider Underworld Official Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the Eidos and Crystal Dynamics official trailer for the game Tomb Raider Underworld. 

Published on the site GameTrailers on 18/07/08, it was a great shock to those who saw it in first-hand like me! 

In the trailer you can see the Croft Manor in fire and we see that the time is back up to the minute where LARA CROFT explodes her own house! Why? It is unknown ... Only if we play we will learn what is really happening in this new adventure of Miss Croft...
